item.title: Release 2.0.0
item.description: Upgrade from 1.x.x to 2.0.0 The transition from CeresDB to Apache HoraeDB introduces several breaking changes. To facilitate upgrading from older versions to v2.0.0, specific alterations are necessary. Upgrade Steps Setup required envs export HORAEDB_DEFAULT_CATALOG=ceresdb Update config Etcd’s root should be configured both in horaedb and horaemeta For horaedb [cluster_deployment.etcd_client] server_addrs = ['127.0.0.1:2379'] root_path = "/rootPath" For horaemeta storage-root-path = "/rootPath" Upgrade horaemeta Horaedb will throw following errors, which is expected
